Description of Pivot: Launched 3 new variants in Q1 2025 across Namkeen, Sweets: - Launch of new namkeen flavors: Aloo Bhujia (Spicy Mix), Moong Dal (with herbs), and Sweet Jalebi..
Launched 2 new variants in Q1 2025 across Potato Chips, Snacks: - New flavor launch for potato chips: Classic Salted, and Spicy Chaat..
Launched 1 new variants in Q1 2025 across Sweets, Namkeen: - Introduction of a new sweet: Chocolate Barfi, along with a new namkeen: Chana Chaat..
Launched 1 new variants in Q1 2025 across Extruded Snacks: - Launch of a new extruded snack: Masala Munchies with added cheese flavor..
Launched 4 new variants in Q1 2025 across Namkeen, Snacks: - New namkeen variants: Papad Chivda, Chana Jor Garam, and Moong Dal (crispy)..
Launched 2 new variants in Q1 2025 across Spices, Pulses: - Introduction of premium spice mixes: Garam Masala and Tandoori Tikka Mix..
Launched 2 new variants in Q1 2025 across Biscuits, Snacks: - New biscuit flavor: Butter Cream, and a new savory snack flavor: Cheese Crackers..
